title: NYX Mega Shine Lip Gloss, Plush Red, 0.37 Ounce
description: NYX’s signature lip gloss offers a creamy, lacquer finish with high-impact color pay-off and incredible shine and sheen. This makeup artist favorite can be used as both a gloss or a stain depending on application technique.

title: NYX Cosmetics Eye Shadow Palette 10 Color, Jazz Night, 0.49-Ounce
description: Ten shades of eye shadow that features bold combinations, high pigmentation and lasting wear. Shade selections are inspired by colors and fashion form around the world. Sleek case includes a double ended sponge applicator. Perfect for application on the go.

title: NYX Soft Matte Lip Cream, London
description: Neither lipstick nor lip gloss—this is matte lip cream. A new kind of pout paint that goes on silky smooth and sets to a matte finish. Soft matte lip cream is surprisingly durable and, unlike some matte lipstick formulas, also moisturizing. Available in 11 lip colors.
